title: Setting Up a Mastodon Bot?
description: This is the first video in a new series about making a Mastodon Bot. Mastodon is a decentralized open source social media platform.

codeExamples.title: Mastodon Bot Repo
codeExamples.description: Bot for mastodon created by Daniel Shiffman on Coding Train

links.title: Mastodon
links.description: Decentralized social media powered by Mastodon

links.title: Workflow - Node
links.description: In this video, I discuss how I use node.js and global packages (to generate p5 sketches, run a web server) as part of my workflow.

links.title: Workflow - Shell
links.description: What is a "shell"? In this video, I look at at "zsh" (instead of the default Mac OSX shell: bash).
